docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 29--Ismael Gonzalez Arevalo, Foreign Minister of Guatemala, said today that his country needed additional foreign investment if its rich mineral resources were to be fully utilized for the economy of the American republics.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 29--Ismael Gonzalez Arevalo, Foreign Minister of Guatemala, said today that his country needed additional foreign investment if its rich mineral resources were to be fully utilized for the economy of the American republics.

docs.snippet: WICHITA, Kan., Sept. 30 (AP)-- Mrs. Babe Didrikson Zaharias of Prairie View, Ill., blasted a 5-underpar 70 to gain the 54-hole lead in the National women's open golf tournament with a score of 221 today.
docs.lead_paragraph: WICHITA, Kan., Sept. 30 (AP)-- Mrs. Babe Didrikson Zaharias of Prairie View, Ill., blasted a 5-underpar 70 to gain the 54-hole lead in the National women's open golf tournament with a score of 221 today.

headline.main: MRS. ZAHARIAS' 221 LEADS IN U.S. GOLF; She Cards a 70 to Set Pace by 4 Strokes--Betsy Rawls Next, Mrs. Bush Third

docs.snippet: Sharp improvement in dollar and gold reserves continues to mark the international trade position of many foreign countries. In view of defense preparations here and the record levels of the United States economy, this trend still has a long way to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Sharp improvement in dollar and gold reserves continues to mark the international trade position of many foreign countries. In view of defense preparations here and the record levels of the United States economy, this trend still has a long way to go, in the opinion of foreign trade authorities.

docs.snippet: WICHITA, Kan., Oct. 1 (AP)-- Mrs. Babe Didrikson Zaharias won her second women's national open golf tournament today with a fiveunder-par 70 for a seventy-two-hole score of 291, tying the record for the event.
docs.lead_paragraph: WICHITA, Kan., Oct. 1 (AP)-- Mrs. Babe Didrikson Zaharias won her second women's national open golf tournament today with a fiveunder-par 70 for a seventy-two-hole score of 291, tying the record for the event.

headline.main: LINKS HONORS WON BY MRS. ZAHARIAS; She Finishes With 5-Under-Par 70 to Take National Open With Record-Tying 291

docs.snippet: Last week's foreign exchange market had completed its cycle of trading limits--five days, Monday to Friday--when late on the latter day an Ottawa dispatch disclosed that the Canadian Government had instructed banks to suspend dealings in foreign...
docs.lead_paragraph: Last week's foreign exchange market had completed its cycle of trading limits--five days, Monday to Friday--when late on the latter day an Ottawa dispatch disclosed that the Canadian Government had instructed banks to suspend dealings in foreign exchange until further notice, pending a study of the situation by the Canadian Cabinet.
